title: Re: New here!
content:
Step 1: click the "My Control Center" link at the top of the page.

Step 2: click the "Edit Profile" link.

Step 3: Paste the URL of your avatar in the top text box.

title: Re: New here!
content: I have no Idea how to use this thing. I havent used a dos program in so long. I think i made a c thing, and I can see the game folders in the DIR yet i cant reach them. I put the games in C:\ck and there in a folder in indivudial folders. So the pic link isnt working for me. is there a way i could step-by-step do what soemone else did? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img]

title: Re: New here!
content:
If you see a directory called "ck" with your "dir" command, you can enter it by typing this, followed with an Enter of course:
cd ck
The CD means Change Directory.
If you want to go back (up a level), type:
cd ..
If you're lost you might want to type the following to get back as far as possible:
cd\

I hope that helps.

[quote]Quote:[hr] Yeah, keen dreams doesn't seem to have any music or sound. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] [hr][/quote]

No, believe KeenRush.
There is in fact sound, just no music, although the menu indicates there should be.
(There was supposed to be, but the publisher wanted to ship the game on an older variant of diskette, to reach as big a potential audience as possible.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

"Eat Your Veggies" from Keen4 was really supposed to be the theme song for CKDREAMS, but Softdisk wanted to put the game on 1 disk...

title: Re: There In!!
content:
k, I found the games, yet there in folders. so how do I run the games. It says:
KEEN1~1
Keen2~2
keen3~3
KEEN4~4
Keen5~5
Keen6~6
Keen Dreams

title: Re: There In!!
content:
Type CD KEEN1 then press the Tab button, and then enter. You are now in the Keen 1 directory. You may now type in KEEN1 or KEEN1E to play Keen 1. This will work for the other games, but you must type Keen2, Keen3, Keen4, Keen5, Keen6 or "Keen Dreams" to access those folders. (If you type "Keen Dreams", don't press Tab. Do includes the quotes.)
